price: “Do not run away, but return to your luxuries and dwellings[7], perhaps you will be questioned.”
arabic: لَا تَرۡكُضُواْ وَٱرۡجِعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَآ أُتۡرِفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ وَمَسَٰكِنِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ
footnotes: [7] This is said to them in sarcasm and ridicule.
